contact_page_description: Contact Farray's Center Barcelona. We answer your questions about classes, schedules and prices. Located between Plaza España and Sants. Response in 24h.
contact_hero_subtitle: We are here to help you. Write to us and we will respond as soon as possible.
contact_form_subtitle: Have any questions? Fill out the form and we will get in touch with you soon.
contact_form_discovery: How did you hear about us?
contact_discovery_event: I saw an event or performance
contact_form_message_placeholder: Tell us how we can help you...
contact_form_success: Message sent successfully! We will respond soon.
contact_form_error: There was an error sending the message. Please try again.
contact_error_firstName: Please enter your first name (minimum 2 characters)
contact_error_lastName: Please enter your last name (minimum 2 characters)
contact_error_phone: Please enter a valid phone number
contact_error_message: Message must be between 10 and 2000 characters
contact_error_privacy: You must accept the privacy policy to continue
contact_consent_text: I have read and accept the
contact_rate_limit_info: To prevent spam, you can only send 3 messages every 15 minutes.
contact_rate_limited_message: You have reached the maximum of 3 submissions in 15 minutes. Please wait {minutes} minutes.
contact_rate_limited_alternative: If you need immediate assistance, call us at
contact_legal_text: Controller: Farray's International Dance Center S.L. Purpose: Handle your inquiry and contact you. Legal basis: Your consent. Recipients: Data will not be shared with third parties. Rights: Access, rectification, erasure, restriction, portability and objection. More information in our privacy policy.
leadModal_title: Discover how to get started at Farray's Center
leadModal_subtitle: We will send you all the information to start dancing with us clearly and with no commitment.
leadModal_intro: Fill out the form and receive all the information you need in your email to make a calm decision and choose the option that best fits you.
leadModal_benefit3: How the club works and what membership includes
leadModal_benefit4: January Open Days and welcome promotion
leadModal_discovery_event: I saw an event or performance
leadModal_error_discovery: Please indicate how you found us
leadModal_error_consent: You must accept the privacy policy to continue
leadModal_error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
leadModal_consent_text: I agree to receive information about prices, schedules and promotions from Farray's Center. I can unsubscribe at any time.
leadModal_legal_text: The requested information is sent automatically from Farray's Center as part of its information and guidance service. Registration as a member and participation in sports activities is formalized exclusively with Club Esportiu Farray Barcelona (sports entity), in accordance with its internal regulations and membership conditions. This form does not imply registration, reservation or contracting.
leadModal_legal_link: View legal notice and privacy policy
leadModal_success_message: We have sent the guide to your email.
leadModal_success_spam_note: If you don't see it in a few minutes, check your Promotions or Spam folders.
leadModal_success_deliverability: To make sure you receive all the information, we recommend adding our email to your contacts list.
leadModal_success_language_note: Important Note: All information is sent exclusively in Spanish.
